weeks.label: Week 8
weeks.summary: Intelligence week. ACOS evolved from v8 to v10 with autonomous intelligence, safety guarantees, and Starlight integration. Investor vertical launched. Valentine's Day experiences shipped.

entries.title: ACOS v10 — Autonomous Intelligence
entries.description: Five new safety and intelligence systems: Experience Replay, Agent IAM, Immutable Audit Trail, Confidence Circuit Breaker, and Conservative Self-Modify Gate. Intelligence score jumped from 72 to 93/100. Hooks optimized from 15 to 7.

entries.title: Investor Intelligence Vertical
entries.description: New /investor hub with 4 sub-pages. 14 products across dual-track pricing: Institutional $97-697 and Individual $27-147. Adaptive mega-menu with compact/medium/grouped layouts.

entries.title: Starlight Intelligence System v4.0
entries.description: Universal intelligence layer with ACOS bi-directional sync. 8 modules including SyncBridge and ScoreEngine. 109 memory entries synced across sessions.

entries.title: Valentine's Day Interactive Experiences
entries.description: Personal letter with Vietnamese poetry, AI artwork, and interactive piano synthesizer using Web Audio API with Salamander Grand Piano samples.

entries.title: Hook System Optimization
entries.description: Trimmed from 15 hooks to 7. Per-tool-use subprocess spawns reduced from 5-6 to 1-2. Safe for 3-4 concurrent Claude Code instances on 16GB RAM.

weeks.label: Week 6
weeks.summary: Infrastructure week. ACOS v7.0 shipped, 7 research portals launched, claude-flow fully integrated.

entries.title: ACOS v7.0 — Unified Orchestration
entries.description: Complete integration of claude-flow V3 into ACOS. Unified auto-router with intelligent complexity detection, Ultraworld creative swarm, hierarchical swarm topology with anti-drift.

entries.title: 7 Research Portals — Enterprise AI Authority
entries.description: Healthcare, AI Architecture, Agentic AI, AI Ops, Oracle Database, Sovereign AI, and Cost Engineering. 164 validated sources, schema.org structured data, dedicated sitemap.

entries.title: AI Ops Intelligence Hub
entries.description: Full /ai-ops section with 6 sub-routes: architecture patterns, implementation patterns, 2026 model landscape, maturity model, OCI accelerator packs.

entries.title: Research SEO & Discoverability
entries.description: Phase 1 trust infrastructure: methodology page, schema.org Article + FAQPage markup on all 7 portals, dedicated research sitemap, enriched sources with 164 validated references.

entries.title: Family Tree Design System — 15 Variants
entries.description: Interactive genealogical visualization with 15 design variants. Connection graphs, hierarchical trees, timeline views.

entries.title: ACOS Visual Identity — Imagen 4 Ultra
entries.description: Three iterations of ACOS visuals using Imagen 4, culminating in Ultra-quality renders. 9 premium images, 23 MB total.
